patthana4.5:1.1: Kusalaṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.5:2.1: Akusalaṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.5:3.1: Abyākataṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:4.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:6.1: Kusalo sārammaṇo dhammo kusalassa sārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.5:7.1: Akusalo sārammaṇo dhammo akusalassa sārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.5:8.1: Abyākato sārammaṇo dhammo abyākatassa sārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.5:9.1: Kusalo sārammaṇo dhammo kusalassa sārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:10.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare satta …pe… sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… sampayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:12.1: Abyākataṃ anārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:16.1: Abyākato anārammaṇo dhammo abyākatassa anārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo … atthipaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo (sabbattha ekaṃ. Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:17.1: Kusalo citto dhammo kusalassa cittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:18.1: Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare satta …pe… upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, natthiyā satta, vigate satta. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:21.1: Kusalaṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:22.1: Akusalaṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:23.1: Abyākataṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.5:24.1: Kusalaṃ nocittañca abyākataṃ nocittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.5:25.1: Akusalaṃ nocittañca abyākataṃ nocittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.5:26.1: Kusalaṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nocitto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:27.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
patthana4.5:28.1: Kusalo nocitto dhammo kusalassa nocittassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:29.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:30.1: Kusalaṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.5:31.1: Akusalaṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.5:32.1: Abyākataṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:33.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:35.1: Kusalo cetasiko dhammo kusalassa cetasikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.5:36.1: Akusalo cetasiko dhammo akusalassa cetasikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.5:37.1: Abyākato cetasiko dhammo abyākatassa cetasikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.5:38.1: Kusalo cetasiko dhammo kusalassa cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:39.1: Akusalo cetasiko dhammo akusalassa cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:40.1: Abyākato cetasiko dhammo abyākatassa cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:41.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare satta …pe… sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… sampayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:43.1: Kusalaṃ acetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.5:44.1: Akusalaṃ acetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.5:45.1: Abyākataṃ acetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.5:46.1: Kusalaṃ acetasikañca abyākataṃ acetasikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.5:47.1: Akusalaṃ acetasikañca abyākataṃ acetasikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:48.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana4.5:49.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana4.5:51.1: Kusalaṃ cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṃ cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṃ cittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivatti dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:52.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:54.1: Abyākataṃ ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:55.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, sahajāte ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:57.1: Kusalo ajjhattiko dhammo kusalassa ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Kusalo ajjhattiko dhammo akusalassa ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Kusalo ajjhattiko dhammo abyākatassa ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (3)
patthana4.5:58.1: Akusalo ajjhattiko dhammo akusalassa ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:59.1: Abyākato ajjhattiko dhammo abyākatassa ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:60.1: Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā …pe… samanantare satta, sahajāte nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte ekaṃ, āsevane tīṇi, vipāke āhāre indriye ekaṃ …pe… vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:62.1: Kusalaṃ bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:63.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
patthana4.5:64.1: Kusalo bāhiro dhammo kusalassa bāhirassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:65.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:67.1: Abyākato upādā dhammo abyākatassa upādā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo … atthipaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.5:68.1: Āhāre ekaṃ, indriye atthiyā avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:69.1: Kusalaṃ noupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:70.1: Akusalaṃ noupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:71.1: Abyākataṃ noupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.5:72.1: Kusalaṃ noupādā ca abyākataṃ noupādā ca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.5:73.1: Akusalaṃ noupādā ca abyākataṃ noupādā ca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:74.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:76.1: Kusalo noupādā dhammo kusalassa noupādā dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:77.1: Akusalo noupādā dhammo akusalassa noupādā dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:78.1: Abyākato noupādā dhammo abyākatassa noupādā dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.5:79.1: Kusalo noupādā dhammo kusalassa noupādā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.5:81.1: Abyākato noupādā dhammo abyākatassa noupādā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:82.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare …pe… sahajāte satta, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye upanissaye nava …pe… vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate ekādasa. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:84.1: Abyākataṃ upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato upādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:85.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:87.1: Kusalaṃ anupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.5:90.1: Kusalaṃ anupādinnañca abyākataṃ anupādinnañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.5:91.1: Akusalaṃ anupādinnañca abyākataṃ anupādinnañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:92.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:94.1: Kusalo anupādinno dhammo kusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.5:97.1: Kusalo anupādinno dhammo kusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:98.1: Akusalo anupādinno dhammo akusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:99.1: Abyākato anupādinno dhammo abyākatassa anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Abyākato anupādinno dhammo kusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Abyākato anupādinno dhammo akusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:100.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare cha …pe… sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane tīṇi …pe… vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate ekādasa. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:102.1: Akusalaṃ upādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo upādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:103.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Upādānagocchakaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
